data.meta_description: Kitex ltd Kitex ltd - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The textile industry has evolved significantly over time from a small domestic industry to a large organized global industry. During the Industrial Revolution in Great Britain, textiles like cotton, wool and flax became a major export. New machines like the spinning wheel and handloom increased production efficiency. Further innovations led to the industrialization of the textile industry in Britain, with mills located along rivers powered by water wheels. In the modern era, innovations in electronics have created a competitive global textile industry that can produce almost any type of cloth or fabric.
